page.title: 06Road Travel through Orwell
page.content: {Milnathort}is at the crossing of the {A90}Edinburgh to Perth and the{A91 Stirling to St Andrews roads, and is joined by the{A911}to Glenrothes, Fife The{M90 Motorway}now by-passes the village, taking nearly all the north- south traffic. Bus services pass through the village linking Lochgelly and Glenrothes with Kinross, Inverness with Edinburgh and St Andrews with Glasgow. The Scottish Bus Group companies and private long- haul operators ply these routes. Car-sharing is done by some people whose work is not in Milnathort. Perth is 16 miles away, Rosyth Dockyard is 20 miles, and Edinburgh 28 miles. Most children in this area walk to school (Milnathort Primary School is in block 03080702), but some come by car because there are very few foot- paths beside the country roads.
